dict.acceptation: 平原；平地；[纺织业]平针；朴实无华的东西；
平的；素的；清晰的；相貌平平的；
清楚地，明白地；平易地；[用以加强语气]显然；完全地；

sent.orig: If it is a plain string, it is assumed to be a plain column name.
sent.trans: 如果是普通字符串，则被当作列名。

sent.orig: It is a plain thing, a very plain truth.
sent.trans: 马克思主义是很朴实的东西，很朴实的道理。

sent.orig: Plain life, also looking for plain fun.
sent.trans: 平淡的生活，也要寻找平淡的乐趣。

sent.orig: His failure is as plain as plain can be.
sent.trans: 他的失败是再明白不过了。

sent.orig: It's as plain as plain can be.
